content:
689 
 
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
    (xxi) KWASU requires English Language chosen course and any 
two (2) from Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Further 
Mathematics.  
(xxii) TSUJ accepts Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, 
Chemistry, Economics, Biology and Agricultural Science.  
(xxiii) EVAGENL accepts Biology as one (1) of the two (2) other 
subjects.  
(xxiv) FED-DUTSE accepts Biology as one (1) of the two (2) other 
subjects.  
(xxv) UMUDIKE requires Mathematics and any two (2) of 
Physics, Chemistry and Geography or Economics.  
(xxvi) FED-LOKOJA requires Mathematics and any other two (2) 
Science subjects.  
(xxvii) FUTA requires Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, 
Chemistry, Economics, Biology and Agricultural Science.  
(xxviii) NTNU – Same as in Computer Science.  
(xxiv) CALEB accepts Mathematics and any two (2) Science 
subjects.  
(xxv) ABUJA accepts Biology as one (1) of the other two (2) 
subjects.  
(xxvi) AUGUSTINE requires Mathematics and Physics, and one (1) 
of Chemistry, Biology, Geography and Economics in the 
order of preference.  
(xxvii) MAUTY  requires  Mathematics,  Physics/Economics, 
Chemistry/Biology/Agricultural Science.  
(xxviii) UNIKINGS requires Mathematics, Physics and any of 
Biology, Chemistry or Agricultural Science.  
(xxxix)   MOUNTAIN TOP accepts English Language, Mathematics and 
any two (2) of Physics, Biology or Chemistry.  
(xxx) FED-DUTSINMA accepts Mathematics, Physics and any of 
Chemistry, Economics or Geography.  
(xxxi) FED-OYEEKITI accepts English Language, Mathematics, 
Physics and Chemistry.  
(xxxii) MINNA requires Mathematics, Physics, and any one(1) of 
Chemistry, Economics or Geography.
